name: FGameplayCueNotify_DecalInfo
doc:
FGameplayCueNotify_DecalInfo

    Properties that specify how to spawn a decal.

SpawnConditionOverride: Condition to check before spawning the decal.
PlacementInfoOverride: Defines how the decal will be placed.
DecalSize: Decal size in local space (does not include the component scale).
FadeOutStartDelay: Sets when the decal actor will start fading out.  Will override setting in class.
FadeOutDuration: Sets how long it takes for decal actor to fade out.  Will override setting in class.
bOverrideSpawnCondition: If enabled, use the spawn condition override and not the default one.
bOverridePlacementInfo: If enabled, use the placement info override and not the default one.
bOverrideFadeOut: If enabled, override default decal actor fade out values.
